price: (14) And near above them are its shades, and its [fruit] to be picked will be lowered in compliance.
arabic: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيۡهِمۡ ظِلَٰلُهَا وَذُلِّلَتۡ قُطُوفُهَا تَذۡلِيلٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wadāniyatan ʿalayhim ẓilāluhā wadhullilat quṭūfuhā tadhlīlan
